name: After Light (bringjoy)
description:
The game story is about a light beam from sky suddenly came up in middle of a gun fight and erase people's memory. People don's know other role but their role, they need to fight for their life and also for their role.

PLAY MODE 

- Single mode: you can play with another 4 bots following steps:  Create Room / Ready / Pick Character / Start.

- Co-op Mode: create a room and ask your friends to join with.  In the game, you can chat by just start typing.

HOW TO WIN

- You only know your role and who is Sherrif. Depend on your role, you need to kill or protect specific people. If you are: 

+ Sheriff: kill outlaws to protect the town

+ Deputy: protect sheriff ( by kill outlaw and 2-faces)

+ Outlaws: kill sheriff to dominate the town

+ 2 faces: help sheriff to kill outlaws and kill sheriff after that.

HOW TO PLAY

- Everyone has 4-5 health point, if your health point drop to 0, you died.

- On FIRST turn, everyone has a number of  random actions based on their HP. On a NEW turn, you get 2 more random actions.

- Sheriff will has more 1 hp than other role and can not be stun by `Poison Dart`.

ex: your hero is `Bart One Eye`, he has 4 Hp. Then at the first turn, he has 4 random actions. If his role is Sherrif, he has 5 Hp as well as 5 random actions. 

- On your turn, you can use as much as action / skill you have, click end turn / next button when finish your moves.

- When turn end, the moves / actions you have need to equal or lower than your HP, if you have more actions than your HP, you need to choose what action need to be removed or it will be removed automatically.

ex: At the time you want to end turn,  you have 5 actions but your HP is only 3. Then you need to remove 2 actions.

- By default, you can only attack person next to you, equip new weapon may increase your attack range.

- Every characters have their own ability, choose it wisely can made you become very powerful. We only have 5 characters now but we push 4 more characters every month.

There are more interested things you can explore in the game. Have fun !

*Disclaimer*: This game is heavily inspired by the board game BANG! by Emiliano Sciarra, (c) 2002 dV Games.
